comments.body: Should we document that default per-protocol ports get used if one isn't set explicitly? (This is one of those things that should be obvious, except to everyone for whom it isn't.)
Doesn't hurt, bound to get asked or someone would be interested to know.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@    - A string or dict that specifies the proxy to be set.
    - If setting a string, should be in the form C(hostname), C(hostname:port),
      or C(protocol=hostname:port).
    - If the port is undefined, the default port for the protocol in use is
      used.
